nav.SubTitle: New Holland Construction’s third-generation SuperBoom vertical-lift design

frame.nav: The vertical lift linkage of SuperBoom ensures that the higher the load is lifted, the farther forward the load can be placed.

nav.SubTitle: Low-effort, self-neutralizing hand controls and responsive foot controls

frame.nav: The easy-to-use platform allows the operator to spend a full day on the job and still feel productive at quitting time.

nav.SubTitle: Easy access to power train components by lifting seat

frame.nav: Flip up the seat -- without tools -- to access the hydraulic pumps and drivetrain components.
A new digital overhead instrument panel provides clear, quick references to important indicators and service points.

nav.SubTitle: Easy entrance and exit to / from the widest cab in the industry

frame.nav: Operators will appreciate the new cab enclosure option, with optional air conditioning to keep them cool, productive and alert on the hottest days.

nav.SubTitle: Low center of gravity, long wheelbase, and standard full suspension seat

frame.nav: The superior stability of New Holland Construction skid steer loaders provides an excellent ride and allows the operator to travel with a full bucket over the roughest terrain without worry of spillage material or unexpected tipping.

Super Boom geometry provides more lift capacity per pound of total machine weight.

For an animated demonstration of Super Boom click on the flashing link below the product.

nav.SubTitle: Service doors provide easy access to engine and service ports

frame.nav: With easy access to routine maintenance points, daily maintenance chores are lowered and the bottom line is increased.
Super Boom skid steers offer industry-leading visibility because there are no rear frame towers to block your view.
Fast ground speeds decrease cycle times and increase output.
